Package communication

Class TradingHandler

java.lang.Object
communication.TradingHandler
public class TradingHandler extends Object
Executes trading statements

14.03.2022
Author:
Yvonne Rahnfeld

    • initTradeOffer

      public void initTradeOffer​(Item offeredItem, String requestedItem, String tradingPartner)
      Build trade and send offer to trading partner, if no offer is open or player wants to replace the offer
      Parameters:
      offeredItem - The item the player wants to offer
      requestedItem - The item the player wants to receive
      tradingPartner - The trading partner for this offer

    • sendTradeMessage

      public void sendTradeMessage​(String message, String topic)
      Method to send a trade message to a topic
      Parameters:
      message - the message
      topic - the topic

    • receiveOffer

      public void receiveOffer​(String[] input)
      Player gets asked to accept trade offer. If he accepts the offer and owns the requested item the trade will be continued. If he declines, the trade will be aborted.
      Parameters:
      input - Offer Content: [0] messageCode, [1] offeredItem, [2] requestedItem, [3] playerName, [4] tradingPartner, [5] timestamp

    • acceptCurrentTrade

      public void acceptCurrentTrade()
      Start execution of accepted trade if player owns still his offered item, otherwise abort trade

    • executeCurrentTrade

      public void executeCurrentTrade()
      Execute current trade: send item to trading partner, remove from inventory and set current trade to null

    • receiveItem

      public void receiveItem​(String[] itemData)
      Add received item to inventory and show confirmation
      Parameters:
      itemData - Content: [0] messageCode, [1] name, [2] description, [3] state, [4] strength, [5] maxStrength, [6] where

    • abortCurrentTrade

      public void abortCurrentTrade​(String dialogMessage)
      Abort current trade: show message, remove from hash map and set current trade to null
      Parameters:
      dialogMessage - Message to show in dialog

    • buildTradeOffer

      public String buildTradeOffer()
      Method to build an offer to send structure: 4x chars type of message; name of offered item, name of requested item, name of tradingPartner, my name; timestamp of the trade
      Returns:
      the offer

    • buildAbortedMessage

      public String buildAbortedMessage​(String requestedItem, String offeredItem, String cause)
      Build message for aborting trade
      Parameters:
      requestedItem - Name of requested item
      offeredItem - Name of offered item
      cause - Cause of abortion (message)
      Returns:
      Abortion message string
